creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: pounded indigo on three sides; top embroidery on red wool in purples, blues, greens, and white; attached straps embroidered on red cotton in similar colors; ties cut; center panel of red wool embriodered in similar colors; three sided striped border; three outside edges bordered in red wool and red and white cotton; top of center panel has different embroidered band on silk; open blue lining
title: Baby Carrier
